title: Get Windows 11 Pro and Microsoft Office for just $50
content:
Macworld

Sure, this is Macworld, but you likely know some PC users out there, and you might even dabble yourself. In such a case, right now is a great time to take advantage of this deal on The All-in-One Microsoft Office Pro 2019 for Windows: Lifetime License + Windows 11 Pro Bundle through January 21st at 11:59 pm PT only. 

This two-part bundle includes lifetime licenses to both Microsoft Office Pro 2019 and Windows 11 Pro. For one price, you can upgrade your Windows operating system and get the world’s leading office suite. That’s a powerful productivity and security upgrade for your PC, plus Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Teams, OneNote, Publisher, and Access. Windows 11 Pro offers heightened security with BitLocker encryption and collaborative tools like remote desktop, plus it’s rated 4/5 stars on PC Magazine. 

Sold separately, you could expect this deal to run you over $400. However, you can get The All-in-One Microsoft Office Pro 2019 for Windows: Lifetime License + Windows 11 Pro Bundle for just $49.97 through January 21st at 11:59 pm PT only. 

 

The All-in-One Microsoft Office Pro 2019 for Windows: Lifetime License + Windows 11 Pro Bundle – $49.97

See Deal

StackSocial prices subject to change.
